elements.name: micx-cdn-image-loader
elements.description: Load correct image sizes from CDN image link (sizes are encoded in the URL).

attributes.name: debug
attributes.description: Enable debug mode (output debug information to the console)

attributes.name: default-size-adjust
attributes.description: Set size adjustments for different screen sizes. Format: '<min-screen-width>:<zoom-factor>;<min-screen-width>:<zoom-factor>;...'. Example: '600:2;900:1.5' means for screens wider than 600px use zoom factor 1.2, for screens wider than 900px use zoom factor 1.5.

attributes.name: data-size-adjust
attributes.description: Load a bigger or smaller version based on the screen size. Format '<min-screen-width>:<zoom-factor>;<min-screen-width>:<zoom-factor>;...'. Example: '600:2;900:1.5' means for screens wider than 600px use zoom factor 1.2, for screens wider than 900px use zoom factor 1.5.
